searchQueries.title: Search queries
searchQueries.description: Queries to search LinkedIn posts. The same query as you would use in the LinkedIn search bar.

maxPosts.title: Maximum number of posts to scrape per each search query
maxPosts.description: Maximum number of posts to scrape per each search query. If you set this to 0, it will scrape all posts.

postedLimit.title: Posted Limit (filter)
postedLimit.description: Fetch posts no older than X time. Options: '24h', 'week', 'month'.

authorUrls.title: Profile or Company URLs who posted
authorUrls.description: List of LinkedIn profile or company URLs to scrape. Example: `https://www.linkedin.com/in/williamhgates` will fetch posted or re-posted content by Bill Gates.

authorsCompanies.title: Companies where authors work
authorsCompanies.description: Scrape posts of profile-authors who assigned to LinkedIn Company Names of these companies. Example: `Google` will fetch posts of Google employees or ex-employees in some cases.

profileScraperMode.title: Profile Scraper Mode
enumTitles: Main - scrape profile details without expanding profile sections ($0.002 per main profile)
profileScraperMode.description: Choose the mode for scraping LinkedIn profiles. The Short mode provides basic information, while the Full mode includes full detailed profile data.

startPage.title: Start Page
startPage.description: The page number to start scraping from.

scrapePages.title: Number of pages to scrape
scrapePages.description: The number of search pages to scrape. Each page contains 100 posts

maxReactions.title: Maximum number of reactions to scrape per post
maxReactions.description: Maximum number of reactions to scrape per post. Default is 5.

commentsPostedLimit.title: Comments Posted Limit (filter)
commentsPostedLimit.description: Fetch comments no older than X time. Options: '24h', 'week', 'month'.

maxComments.title: Maximum number of comments to scrape per post
maxComments.description: Maximum number of comments to scrape per post.
